title: Replace hero image with a more cartoony cute illustration

requirements.summary: Add the new cartoony cute hero illustration as a static public asset under frontend/public/assets/generated so it is served directly by the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: A new cartoony hero image file exists in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filename specified in this build request.
The image is accessible at runtime via an `` URL and loads successfully in the browser network tab (no 404).

file_operations.description: Add the generated cartoony hero portrait illustration asset at this exact path/filename so it is served as a static file (no backend involvement).

requirements.summary: Update HeroSection to reference the new cartoony hero image filename while preserving the existing onError fallback placeholder behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: `HeroSection` references the new cartoony image path in its main photo `src`.
On page load, the hero section displays the new cartoony image and does not fall back to the "Photo coming soon" placeholder when the asset exists.

file_operations.description: Replace the main hero photo src from `/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg` to `/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-cartoony.dim_1600x2000.jpg`, keeping the existing onError-driven fallback placeholder unchanged.
